gallery_title: Awesome teams drive the digital revolution
heading_subtitle: We can help you build and test Java enterprise, C++ desktop applications, web and mobile development, and test automation. Our key technologies are Java, JavaScript frameworks, PHP, Ruby on Rails, C++, Python, .Net.
hero_p_1: We believe that the creation of great products goes hand-in-hand with open communication. Monitaet is a remote-first company to include the best talent around the globe.
hero_p_2: We ensure effective and direct communication with the engineers with video calls and screen sharing via Google Meet, Zoom, Slack, Skype, Microsoft Teams, and remote access tools when required. Contact your team during business hours and get a clear status report within 15 minutes.
SEO_description: With our experienced team, you can be confident in receiving top-quality services that will drive your business forward.
trial_subtitle: After signing the contract you have 30 days of a trial mode to make sure that we deliver.
